# Recap

---

## Concepts, a

Pages now are *responsive*

Up to 4 scenarios are considered

Every size is now made relative, *rem* replaces *px*

*media* queries make the CSS responsive: it changes as the user resize

Images need to be reworked/replicated

---

## Bootstrap 5

A big CSS+JS that is now open source

Link it from a CDN to have the latest version

---

## BS5 main concept

The screen is divided up in 12 columns

*containers* (sort of boxes) take up 1, 2 ... columns

there are classes that take care of visualisation in *xs*, *sm* ... screens

Use classes to program visualisation of the containers

*lots of divs, less CSS/JS*


---

## BS5 classes

Too many to know!

Reade the BS5 boilerplates seen in class

Search and read about each class on [getbootstrap.com/docs/5.3/getting-started/introduction/](https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.3/getting-started/introduction/)
